public final class Apriltag extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
The subsystem for AprilTag vision processing.

    • getAprilTagPose

      public edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d getAprilTagPose(int aprilTag, edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform2d robotOffset)
      Calculate a target pose relative to an AprilTag on the field.
      Parameters:
      aprilTag - The ID of the AprilTag
      robotOffset - The offset to apply to the pose for proper robot positioning
      Returns:
      The target pose for the robot relative to the AprilTag

    • getDistanceFromAprilTag

      public double getDistanceFromAprilTag(int id)
      Get the distance of the robot from a specific AprilTag.
      Parameters:
      id - AprilTag ID
      Returns:
      Distance in meters, or -1 if tag not found
